info.description: RESTful API for financial accounting management (COA-based) built with Go Fiber.
info.title: Financial Accounting API

post.description: Authenticates a user and sets an HttpOnly JWT cookie

get.description: Returns information of the currently authenticated user
Returns a paginated list of COAs with optional search by code or name

post.description: Creates a new Chart of Account. The code becomes the unique identifier (primary key).

get.description: Returns a paginated list of COAs with optional search by code or name or type
get.summary: List all Chart of Accounts with children

get.description: Returns a single Chart of Account by its code (e.g. "1-1001")

put.description: Updates name, type, parentCode, or isActive of an existing COA by code

delete.description: Soft-deletes a Chart of Account by code

get.description: Returns a paginated list of journal entries

post.description: Creates a journal entry with detail lines. This endpoint uses a DB transaction.

get.description: Returns a single journal entry with all its detail lines

delete.description: Soft-deletes a journal entry (only draft entries can be deleted)

get.description: Get Balance Sheet report up to a specific date (Financial Position)
Get General Ledger transactions for a specific COA
Get Profit & Loss report for a specific period (Income Statement)
Get Trial Balance report for a specific period
